Package camsAction

Class queryEnquiriesMenu

java.lang.Object
interactions.Interaction
interactions.UserMenu
camsAction.queryEnquiriesMenu
public final class queryEnquiriesMenu extends UserMenu
Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of enquiries on their list to choose from. Based on predefined conditions, it may be filtered by camp Effectively serves as a function pointer
Since:
2021-11-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tay Jih How

  • Field Details

    • enquirylist

      private List<Serializable> enquirylist
      Represents the list of enquiries shown to the viewer.

      This is listed as an attribute as it is populated by populate() but needs to be accessed by run.

  • Constructor Details

    • queryEnquiriesMenu

      public queryEnquiriesMenu()

  • Method Details

    • populate

      protected void populate(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control)
      Populates menu choices with enquiries for the user to choose to choose.

      These enquiries can either be for a given camp, or across camps depending on whether the user has selected a camp. These enquiries can either be only their own, or in general depending on whether the user elected to see their own enquiries or all enquiries

      Specified by:
      populate in class UserMenu
      Parameters:
      currentuser - the current user
      s - the scanner used for the app
      control - the container for each of the five active control implementation instances

    • run

      public Interaction run(String currentuser, Scanner s, Controller control) throws UserInfoMissingException, MissingRequestedDataException
      Gives choices, if users pick an enquiry that is not their own, finalise it
      Specified by:
      run in class Interaction
      Parameters:
      currentuser - the id of the current user
      s - the scanner used for the entire app
      control - the controller which contains all the control implementations
      Returns:
      single enquiry menu with user, owner, camp, enquiry, filter tags if the user picked an enquiry, or the appropriate single camp menu with user, camp, filter tags if the user picked back
      Throws:
      UserInfoMissingException - if the user id of the current user cannot be found
      MissingRequestedDataException - if the function requested data from the controller or Data, and it was invalid or missing.
